last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hassan attempts to crack the case one last time. As the grand opening for Swathi's restaurant approaches, she finally finds her soup's secret ingredient.

name: Killer Soup
overview: Swathi dreams of owning a restaurant. But when a murder derails her plan, she and her lover take an outrageous step — to replace him with her husband.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Swathi Shetty, a talentless home chef, cooks up a bizarre plan to replace her husband, Prabhakar, with her lover, Umesh; when a bumbling inspector and amateur villains stir the pot, things don't go as planned and a recipe for chaos ensues.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Swathi's illicit affair takes a shocking turn. Dreaming of opening a hotel, Prabhakar looks to his brother Arvind for support.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A determined Thupalli digs into the case of a newly discovered dead body. Umesh and Swathi take desperate measures to cover their tracks.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After learning that Prabhakar was blackmailed, an irate Arvind digs into Umesh's past. Inspector Hassan wades into Thupalli's case findings.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The police question Swathi and Umesh, while a new blackmailer emerges. Hassan's hallucinations spark questions and new leads.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Appu and Swathi form an alliance, but a suspicious Lucas intervenes. Arvind has a plan of his own. An explosive showdown leaves a bloody mess.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: At the hospital, tensions run high as secrets threaten to emerge. Hassan makes a startling discovery that changes the course of the case.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Appu takes matters into her own hands, while the police investigate Mehrunisa's connection to Manisha Koirala. Kirtima delivers an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Hassan attempts to crack the case one last time. As the grand opening for Swathi's restaurant approaches, she finally finds her soup's secret ingredient.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Swathi Shetty, a talentless home chef, cooks up a bizarre plan to replace her husband, Prabhakar, with her lover, Umesh; when a bumbling inspector and amateur villains stir the pot, things don't go as planned and a recipe for chaos ensues.
